item.description:
We are going to plan to go to the 7:20 movie I think you should buy tickets before hand :)



sorry that I have not done event in a while life has been just crazy
Not sure exactly what time the movie is yet I will post it a few days before
the plan is to go to the movie and then maybe go to holligans for Karokee and drinks

tonight is going to be a special celebration for me I am going to be going to court on friday to finalize this horrible seperation I am in and finally will be divorced
Hope to see you there

Kerry Skinner
Independent Beauty Consultant
